CustomField.description: US-0009872 US-0010038-change label and order of formula
CustomField.formula: TEXT(GMV_Last_30_Days_DWH__c) +' | '+ TEXT(Sold_Items_Last_30_Days_DWH__c ) +' | '+ text( floor( ASP_Last_30_Days__c) ) + "." + right( text( ( 1 + ASP_Last_30_Days__c- floor( ASP_Last_30_Days__c) ) * 100 ), 2 )
CustomField.label: Last 30: GMV | Sold Items | ASP
